data.title: Official web site of Lamar Sorrento, self taught southern artist
data.meta_description: Lamar Sorrento has been creating rock and roll artwork and folk art paintings since about 1991. He is a self-taught southern artist, based in Memphis, TN.
data.text:
Lord help me…

I hate WordPress…. I despise it..

I will be doing the ole miss Motel Art Show the first week in October 2024..in downtown Oxford Ms…I will have a whole lot of new paintings there…..it’s one night only…. Check on their website for details or email me..

you may not hear from me again…this WordPress is the worst..!!,,,, the worst..I may be out there in the ozone.l..whenever my iPad make me run a new system update, all my shit blows up….

this time it may not come back on..

[email protected] is my email..

nine oh one 262-6985 is my phone.

OK BEAUTIFUL PEOPLES—IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIIONS AT ALL, PLEASE CONTACT ME…I LOVE TO TALK AND TO MAKE DEALS AND TO DO WHATEVER..I DO SPECIAL REQUESTS ALL THE TIME.. SO IF YOU WANT SOMEONE SPECIAL PAINTED…THAT’S MY JOB.. EMAIL ME HERE AT [email protected] I CAN TAKE PHONE CALLS TOO—901-262-6985 CALL ANYTIME–IF I DONT ANSWER I AM PROBABLY ASLEEP. YOU CAN’T WAKE ME UP…SO DON’T WORRY..

FREE SHIPPING……FREE SHIPPING…..FROM NOW ON….ON EVERYTHING

EVERY PRICE YOU SEE INCLUDES FREE SHIPPING …to the lower 48 states,,,USA ..only…

if you dont have Paypal, i can always/easily take a credit card over the phone thru the Square program…just call me ….

call me if you need to…(nine -oh -one) 262-6985

i dont mind.. To

i still paint orders for whatever you want….

just ask…!!

note..i only ship to the lower 48 united states,,,
